27e2732a-ac14-44e4-bca7-ca97f629f846.description: The earner of this badge engages in collegial, collaborative coaching. The earner leads the educational leader through a process cycle of reflecting and analyzing his or her leadership practices, decision-making, problem-solving, and planning skills. While coaching, the earner provides probing, high-level, self-reflective questions to challenge the educational leader’s thinking, stimulate growth, and lead to actionable improvements.
27e2732a-ac14-44e4-bca7-ca97f629f846.name: Collaborative Leadership Coaching

badge_template_activities.title: Submit a written narrative responding to overview questions.

Submit a written reflection and application narrative.

323a9e2d-3ea4-4210-bc02-f35dbab61950.description: The earner of this badge can effectively execute the tax levy process. They can utilize data from previous levies, current required data to support the Levy, synthesize the data per state and local guidelines and prepare the final documentation required to file a levy with the taxing officials. This earner can show a responsible and sustainable budget that supports the request for the levy revenue being requested.
323a9e2d-3ea4-4210-bc02-f35dbab61950.name: Tax Levy

33c20af2-2e07-4f1c-80d3-5db1400e7063.description: Collective Bargaining is a standalone micro-credential in a series of MCs offered by Illinois Association of School Boards Officials (IASBO).
